QuestData.Title: The Assault on Dredhollow
QuestData.Description:
The time is upon us, Maw Walker. The Fearstalker's hunters are descending upon us.
We have done all we can do to prepare for their assault. Here.
<The Accuser gives you an ornate staff.>
I fashioned this out of the supplies you brought me. Use it to destroy the Fearstalker's forces.
The fight begins.
